name: Next.js Frontend Platform PRD
description: Full-stack Next.js application with hybrid rendering, edge deployment, and API routes.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Next.js 14+ application leveraging the app router for server components, streaming, and incremental static regeneration.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: Marketing pages, authenticated dashboard, API proxy routes, CMS integration, localization.

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: Core Web Vitals LCP < 2.5s, edge cache hit rate > 85%, accessibility AA, image optimization pipeline.

sections.title: Technical Stack
sections.content: Next.js 14+, React 18, TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS, TanStack Query, Vercel Edge, Playwright.

technology_profile.notes: Leverages Next.js server components for data fetching and incremental static regeneration.

api_guidance.name: Contentful Delivery API
api_guidance.rationale: Delivers localized CMS content ideal for marketing and knowledge base experiences.

api_guidance.name: Auth0 Management API
api_guidance.rationale: Provides authentication, user management, and role-based access for Next.js apps.
